TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeMetadata extends System.Object
public ref class WindowsRuntimeMetadata abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供事件，用于解析仅反射类型请求，用于 Windows 元数据文件提供的类型，以及执行解析的方法。

span.span: Provides an event for resolving reflection-only type requests for types that are provided by Windows Metadata files, and methods for performing the resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 .NET Framework 不同，程序集标识对于 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 类型并不重要。Unlike the .NET Framework, assembly identity isn't important for [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] types. 在 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]中，Windows 元数据文件（。WinMD 文件）仅包含元数据，而不包含代码。In the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)], Windows Metadata files (.WinMD files) contain only metadata, not code. 在 Service Pack 版本中，类型可以从一个 Windows 元数据文件移到另一个文件，因此，能够找到与命名空间相关联的 Windows 元数据文件很重要。Types can move from one Windows Metadata file to another in a service pack release, so it's important to be able to locate the Windows Metadata files that are associated with a namespace. > [!NOTE] > 子命名空间不表示包含。Sub-namespaces don't imply containment. 也就是说，命名空间 a. B 不包含在命名空间 A 中。That is, namespace A.B isn't contained in namespace A.

MemberSignature.Value: public static event EventHandler<System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.DesignerNamespaceResolveEventArgs> DesignerNamespaceResolve;

summary.span: 当 Windows Metadata 文件解析在设计环境中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a Windows Metadata file fails in the design environment.

MemberSignature.Value: public static event EventHandler<System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.NamespaceResolveEventArgs> ReflectionOnlyNamespaceResolve;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.NamespaceResolveEventArgs> ReflectionOnlyNamespaceResolve

member this.ReflectionOnlyNamespaceResolve : EventHandler<System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.NamespaceResolveEventArgs>
Public Shared Event ReflectionOnlyNamespaceResolve As EventHandler(Of NamespaceResolveEventArgs)

summary.span: 当 Windows 元数据文件的解析在仅限反射的上下文中失败时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the resolution of a Windows Metadata file fails in the reflection-only context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发并处理此事件后，在应用程序域的生存期内不会再次引发此事件。After this event is raised and handled, it is not raised again for the lifetime of the application domain. 无法更改定义命名空间的文件的列表。The list of files that defines the namespace cannot be changed. 此事件类似于托管程序集的 事件。This event is analogous to the event for managed assemblies. 请参阅 类。See the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此事件的事件处理程序不应引发异常。The event handler for this event should not throw exceptions.

summary.span: 找到指定命名空间的 Windows Metadata 文件，给定位置列表搜索。

span.span: Locates the Windows Metadata files for a specified namespace, given a list of locations to search.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> ResolveNamespace (string namespaceName, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> packageGraphFilePaths);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> ResolveNamespace(string namespaceName, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<string> packageGraphFilePaths) cil managed

static member ResolveNamespace : string * seq<string> -> seq<string>

param.name: packageGraphFilePaths
param.span: 要搜索 Windows 元数据文件的应用程序路径，或仅要搜索操作系统安装中的 Windows 元数据文件。

span.span: The application paths to search for Windows Metadata files, or to search only for Windows Metadata files from the operating system installation.

summary.span: 找到此指定命名空间的 Windows Metadata 文件，给定指定位置搜索。

span.span: Locates the Windows Metadata files for the specified namespace, given the specified locations to search.

returns.span: 表示定义 的 Windows 元数据文件字符串的一个可枚举的列表。

span.span: An enumerable list of strings that represent the Windows Metadata files that define .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法重载等效于调用 方法重载，并为 `windowsSdkFilePath` 参数指定 `null`。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying `null` for the `windowsSdkFilePath` parameter.

exception.span: 该操作系统版本不支持 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]。

span.span: The operating system version does not support the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].

param.name: windowsSdkFilePath
param.span: 用来搜索由 SDK 提供的 Windows 元数据文件的路径，或用来搜索来自操作系统安装的 Windows 元数据文件，则为 。

span.span: The path to search for Windows Metadata files provided by the SDK, or to search for Windows Metadata files from the operating system installation.

param.name: packageGraphFilePaths
param.span: 要搜索 Windows 元数据文件的应用程序路径。

span.span: The application paths to search for Windows Metadata files.

span.span: An enumerable list of strings that represent the Windows Metadata files that define .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅搜索以 Windows 开头的命名空间的 `windowsSdkFilePath` 的路径。The path you specify for `windowsSdkFilePath` is searched only for namespaces that begin with Windows.

exception.span: 该操作系统版本不支持 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)]。

span.span: The operating system version does not support the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)].
